title: The Sacred Temple
description: An ancient temple requires special offerings to enter its inner chambers. You must gather the sacred items and present them at the altar.

nodes.title: Temple Entrance
nodes.description: You stand before an ancient temple. A stone inscription reads: 'To enter the inner sanctum, one must present 3 sacred candles and 1 golden key at the altar.' You can explore the temple grounds to find these items.

nodes.title: Eastern Garden
nodes.description: You find a peaceful garden with ancient statues. Among the flowers, you discover some sacred candles and a golden key!

nodes.title: Western Shrine
nodes.description: At a small shrine, you find another sacred candle and some gold pieces left as offerings.

nodes.title: The Inner Sanctum
nodes.description: You present the sacred candles and golden key at the altar. The ancient doors slowly open, revealing the inner sanctum! Inside, you find incredible treasures and ancient wisdom.
